name: get flow
Save applications to mongodb
zip file/dir
set env
func:
msg.HOME_DIR = os.homedir()
msg.USER = os.userInfo()
msg.APP_NAME = "PAP"
msg.APP_DIR = path.join(msg.HOME_DIR, "." + msg.APP_NAME)
msg.MINI_APP_DIR = path.join(msg.APP_DIR, env.get("MINI_APPS_FOLDER"))

return msg;

name: zip file/dir
unzip resource
update app menu
custom script
main.js

template:
Choose File
    Choose Folder
